thread.title: Official Nintendo Switch Controller, Accessory Prices Revealed
thread.title_full: Official Nintendo Switch Controller, Accessory Prices Revealed

author: Marty Sliva
title: Official Nintendo Switch Controller, Accessory Prices Revealed
text:
Nintendo has revealed the prices for a handful of their accessories, including the Nintendo Switch Pro Controller, Joy-Con Controllers, and extra Dock Sets.

Nintendo Switch Pro Controller -- $69.99 
Joy-Con Controller Sets -- $79.99 
Individual L/R Joy-Con Controllers -- $49.99 

Nintendo Switch will launch globally on March 3, 2017 for $299.99 USD and 29,980 yen.
Developing... 


Marty Sliva is a Senior Editor at IGN. He once ate a whole blueberry. Follow him on Twitter @McBiggitty .
